MemoryInfobox.description: 'You buried me with the sick, Magistrate, left me for dead. But fate had other plans. Now I've got your secret stash. Catch me if you can. -Hylas'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'Legacy of the First Blade: Hunted'

General_Description: '''Finders Keepers''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra found a note on the [[message board]] left by [[Hylas]], a man bearing a grudge against the Magistrate of [[Potidaia]].
Section_Outcome: Kassandra hunted down Hylas and recovered the money taken from the magistrate.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' – ''[[Legacy of the First Blade: Hunted]]''
